story_p1: Then make my joy complete by being like-minded, having the same love,
story_p2: being one in spirit and of one mind.
story_p3: Do nothing out of selfish ambition or vain conceit.
story_p4: Rather, in humility value others above yourselves,
story_p5: not looking to your own interests but each of you to the interests of the others.
details_gifts_p1: We only accept cash gifts sent to:
rsvp_attending_question: Will you be attending our wedding?
rsvp_success_message: Your response has been recorded. We can't wait to celebrate with you!
modal_text: You can view your invitation in a new tab or download it directly.
invitation_message: We cordially invite you to celebrate our marriage
invitation_bring_text: Please bring this invitation to the venue.
invitation_proof_text: This document serves as proof of RSVP.
footer_copyright: ¬© 2025 Narcisse & Jemima's Wedding. All rights reserved.
details_where_address: With over 25 years of service excellence, Usambara
details_where_address2: offers a unique blend of elegance and natural beauty.
details_gifts_p1b: And EFT sent to this account below:
details_theme_p2: *Note Ladies, we invite you to embrace the
details_theme_p3: glamour of the night in elegant dresses.
details_no_children_p1: Regrettably as per the couples wishes,
rsvp_instructions: Please enter your name to find your invitation and RSVP.
rsvp_instructions_2: then accept or decline your invitation!
